reviews.review: Definitivamente um jogo bem feito e que vale a pena se dedicar. Minha unica reclamaÃ§Ã£o Ã© da comunidade tÃ³xica que faz com que jogadores novos se afastem do game.
Pay to win shit DON'T PLAY

adoro o jogo porem o rank e desbalanceado pois apartir do 5 vc cai contra jogadores rank 1 e 2, ou seja, o cara q comprou recentemente vai joga contra caras q jogam a muito tempo . assim dificultando a partida e causando raiva por conta da toxidade desses jogadores experientes

Es un muy buen juego.
Â¿No me crees? entiendo que tiene problemas en cuanto a bugs y jugabilidad, pero dentro de todo es balanceado el rol de asesino con el de sobrevivientes. Todo esta en aparente equilibrio,
Se disfruta desde ambos lados. Ser sobreviviente es apremiante, y de asesino aun mas (aunque convengamos, ser asesino es mucho mas estresante).
La curva de dificultad esta bastante bien hecha, con el sistema de rangos se aprende bastante (si, tambien hay algun que otro problema de matchmaking)
En conclusion: lo vas a disfrutar solo, pero la experiencia se vuelve unica si se juega con amigos !

once a decent game, its become more like a pile of shit than anything. devs have ruined this game and they don't care. all they care about is making a quick buck.

I stopped playing it quite a while ago. I had received (vivid) rape threats, because I'm a woman and the player who threatened me guessed it, and had signaled it to the Customer service.

I couldn't block the player who did it and Customer service didn't do anything about my report. Result? I got matched with the same player, who threatened me again and said he remembered me very well and was going to enjoy every time he'd ruin the game for me and imagine what he could do to me.

Yes, I can write a list with the name of the players I don't want to play with. Now, where's the fun in having to check everyone's name before the beginning of a game?

So I wrote again to the customer support, explaining I had received rape threats from this dude and other threats from the same person. Customer service basically answered they didn't act on my reports, wouldn't, and that I could just stop playing if I weren't happy I couldn't block some players.

I did stop playing. I've also been telling this story to anyone interested in the game. Please don't be toxic and avoid toxic games. 
(It's really sad though, because I played a LOT before it became impossible to block players, and to protect myself from rape threats.)
